titleStmt.title: Branch Bank of the Farmers' Bank at Princeton

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Branch Bank of the Farmers' Bank at Princeton

body.p: Branch office of the Farmers' Bank of Kentucky located in Princeton, Kentucky. President(s): P. B. McGoodwin, R. B. Ratliffe, Francis W. Ury. Cashier(s): Caleb B. Henry.

ab.bibl:
J. Smith Homans, ed., The Bankers' Magazine, and Statistical Register, vol. XII (June 1860): 995. The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1861 (New York: J. Smith Homans, Jr., Office of the Bankers' Magazine, 1861), 38. The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1863 (New York: J. Smith Homans, Jr., Office of the Bankers' Magazine, 1863), 20. The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1864 (New York: J. Smith Homans, Jr., Office of the Bankers' Magazine, 1864), 19. "An Act to Incorporate the Farmers' Bank of Kentucky," Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Frankfort, Ky.: A. G. Hodges & Co., State Printers, 1849), 7-20.
The Merchants' Bankers' Almanac for 1852 (Boston: Phillips, Sampson, & Co., 1852), xxix.
